descriptionHtml:
This is complete translation of \"EzEs -Artifact Disenchanting\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8157), including files for Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
You can download files separately (for example: Skyrim+Dragonborn, if you haven\'t the DLC Dawnguard).
Or you may download the \"Ultimate\" filepack, if you have Skyrim+Dawnguard+Dragonborn
